TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Toruy, title = Toruy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toruy} }

S.FORM: Toruy Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Toruy a niyaro', 53 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 169 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 163 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal84%, Amis1%, Paiwan2%, roma9%.

Toroy Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Toroy a niyaro', 53 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 169 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 163 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal84%, Amis1%, Paiwan2%, roma9%.
